title: How are my Unity 5.x projects supported as a Unity 5 Pro Perpetual license holder?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have a Unity 5 Pro perpetual license
  • I use Unity 5.x
  • I expect ongoing support for my Unity 5.x project

sections.title: Cause
content: The Unity 5 cycle end date is March 31, 2017.

sections.title: Resolution
content:
Unity intends to provide bug fixes in the form of regular patch releases for Unity 5.6 until March 31, 2018.
For continuing support and new features, purchase a Unity Pro subscription.
